Entries.winter_Sat6: Clint and Emily, heh, never would've seen that one coming!#$b#Hmm, maybe my perception has dimmed in my dotage.$1

Hmm, do you think there could be something going on between my Clint and that rather attractive demon man?$1#$b#Oh, perhaps it's just my writer's brain... always looking for a story arc that may not exist.$2

Entries.{{season}}_{{day}}: $1 Vivienne_Introduction#It's lovely to see you again, @. I hear Eloise told you all about my books? Please don't feel obliged to read them.$1#$e#(if you read this, something is broken, please let me know!)
